title: MiniBlock a font pattern
content:
This is a font pattern inspired in letterpress, you can see how some characters down between lines like R L M, creating interesting forms. Please let me know what do you think.

regards

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090930061935im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/miniblock_4418_6108.jpg)
author: BlueTypo
